entities.name: serpent
entities.description: The enormous serpent is described as being bright, poisonous green, thick as an oak trunk, and having a great blunt head. It has raised itself high in the air and its head is weaving drunkenly between the pillars.

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is described as soaring around the serpent's head, distracting it.

entities.name: basilisk
entities.description: The Basilisk is mentioned as being distracted by Fawkes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is trembling and ready to close his eyes if the serpent turns.

entities.name: oak
entities.description: The oak trunk is used as a comparison for the serpent's thickness.

entities.name: pillars
entities.description: The pillars are mentioned as being between which the serpent's head is weaving.
